analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x03a2f2eb836fdd6ef462edc65bccd358ba1f2375.sol:
	Contract CryptosoulToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x03a2f2eb836fdd6ef462edc65bccd358ba1f2375.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

FreezableToken.freezeTokensAmount should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x03a2f2eb836fdd6ef462edc65bccd358ba1f2375.sol#161-162)
Ownable.masterKey should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x03a2f2eb836fdd6ef462edc65bccd358ba1f2375.sol#69-72)
